text.section: Any fiduciary required to make a return under this chapter shall be subject to all the provisions of this chapter that apply to individuals.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 486, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VII D, sec. 635, effective April 11, 1990. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 77, Pt. I, sec. 5. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 5, Art. III, sec. 6. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 4. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 14. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 9. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4281b-30.
